item.name: 2. User submits ID images via IDO Web Link

body.raw: Note: This request does not do anything and is a placeholder for the step of the process where the user will submit their ID images via the IDO Web Link. Please navigate to the IDO Web Link created in the step 1 to submit images. Successful mathcing on this requires use of the Michael Motorist example ID images provided  DL_MichaelMotorist_front.jpg and DL_MichaelMotorist_back.jpg
